channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Access Docker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Access Docker

item.title: CVE-2021-29699|2024-09-16T19:30:03.824Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 could allow a remote priviled user to upload arbitrary files with a dangerous file type that could be excuted by an user. IBM X-Force ID: 200600.

item.title: CVE-2021-20496|2024-09-16T20:36:29.842Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 could allow an authenticated user to bypass input due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 197966.

item.title: CVE-2021-20499|2024-09-16T20:21:31.261Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 197973

item.title: CVE-2021-20439|2024-09-16T20:06:17.598Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by an unauthorized user.

item.title: CVE-2021-20533|2024-09-16T20:01:16.057Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 198813

item.title: CVE-2021-20510|2024-09-16T19:20:27.926Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 198299

item.title: CVE-2024-35137|2024-07-12T20:48:37.133Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to possibly elevate their privileges due to sensitive configuration information being exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 292413.

item.title: CVE-2024-35139|2024-06-28T18:17:52.832Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from the container due to incorrect default permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 292415.

item.title: CVE-2024-25027|2024-03-31T11:40:11.155Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.6 could disclose sensitive snapshot information due to missing encryption. IBM X-Force ID: 281607.

item.title: CVE-2024-35142|2024-06-05T16:38:41.242Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 through 10.0.6 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to execution of unnecessary privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 292418.

item.title: CVE-2024-35140|2024-06-04T17:33:36.042Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 through 10.0.6 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 292416.

item.title: CVE-2024-35139|2024-06-28T15:42:04.309Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from the container due to incorrect default permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 292415.

item.title: CVE-2024-35137|2024-06-28T15:33:11.156Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to possibly elevate their privileges due to sensitive configuration information being exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 292413.

item.title: CVE-2024-25027|2024-07-01T16:46:49.860Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.6 could disclose sensitive snapshot information due to missing encryption. IBM X-Force ID: 281607.

item.title: CVE-2024-35139|2024-08-02T03:07:46.739Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from the container due to incorrect default permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 292415.

item.title: CVE-2024-35137|2024-08-02T03:07:46.790Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to possibly elevate their privileges due to sensitive configuration information being exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 292413.

item.title: CVE-2024-35142|2024-08-02T03:07:46.775Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 through 10.0.6 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to execution of unnecessary privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 292418.

item.title: CVE-2024-35140|2024-08-02T03:07:46.858Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 through 10.0.6 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 292416.
